Changing a Folder Name or Description

If you have the appropriate privileges, you can rename a StarTeam folder.

To change a folder’s name:

  1. Select the folder from the folder hierarchy in the left pane.

  2. Select Properties from the Folder or context menu. The Folder Properties dialog opens.

  3. Select the Name tab.

  4. Enter a new name in the Folder Name text box.

  5. Enter a new description in the Description text box.

  6. Click OK.
